title: Help for Sem 6 Electives
content:
I am gonna be in 6th sem soon and we have to choose our Electives 3 and 4.  
I have short listed to these few:

  
For Elective 3:

* Computer Vision 
* BlockChain
* Gen Ai

For Elective 4:

* Deep Learning
* Database Technology
* IoT with TinyML

I would like to know what is the difficulty and what does these courses have like is it just maths or some maths or there's more programming or how hard will be the Exams.

  
Pls help me choose. I am hoping for a relative easier subjects this sem.

comments.body:
research on the subject titles. see which one youre interested in. 
Youll do well in the one you like the most. 

its as simple as that.

Computer vision :mid level isa and esa with assignments 
Block chain :easy isa mid/difficult esa (only take this of you're into it)
Gen Ai :(we didn't have it)


Deep learning : mid/easy isa and esa along with a research paper 
Database technology : mid isa and hard esa  along with some hands on 
Iot : teachers wort help you've gotta learn and do stuff on your own , mid isa and isa if you only do slides 

Hope this is helpful
Is database technology really that hard? Some seniors told me that it was pretty easy
what do you mean by research paper for DL?
Ot qas really enjoyable though, I loved the class, and feel.it has made.me a better engineer
